body_html: @girving a size check would be a good first line of defense, and would certainly be a good addition until this is ironed out, but the struct could also have different members/layout with the same size so it should only be a temporary solution.

body: @girving a size check would be a good first line of defense, and would certainly be a good addition until this is ironed out, but the struct could also have different members/layout with the same size so it should only be a temporary solution.
